title: Master Yi
body: I do not think the Project Yi {{champion:11}}  skin should cost as much as it does i think it should cost just as much as the other project skins. I spent 20 dollars to get 2 of the project skins but i ended up paying more for the Project Yi skin and now i do not have the RP to buy another project skin except for Project: Yasuo. {{champion:157}}

replies.body: you mean the skin with an all new VO and animations costs more than the ones that don't? why do legendaries exist at all too be fair. hmmm

Hiya soulslasher12,

As oblivioncrusade mentioned, PROJECT: Yi has some additional odds and ends that the other PROJECT skins do not. 

This includes:

* All new VO.
* Two types of VO processing - one for when he's in Highlander form, and a different one for when he isn't.
* He has new animations, such as auto attacking, swapping into Highlander, emotes, etc. 

Hope this better explains why PROJECT: Yi is a legendary skin, as opposed to the other skins being 1350 RP. ^-^

Thank you for explaining the reasoning behind that I was not 100% sure about as to why certain skins cost more than others because I never really owned any skins aside from the few free ones you can earn like Riot Tristana, Dreadknight Garen and gold alistar. That is why i made the comment that I did. I mostly spoke out of confusion and opinion about it.
